survey_name: Employee Feedback on Workplace Digital Collaboration Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the effectiveness and satisfaction with digital collaboration tools used in the workplace.

questions.question_text: Which digital collaboration tools do you frequently use for work?
questions.client_notes: This question helps identify the most commonly used tools. Consider using a multi-choice format to capture all relevant tools.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an 'Other' option for text input.

script.question_text: Which digital collaboration tools do you frequently use for work?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital collaboration tools provided by your organization?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital collaboration tools provided by your organization?

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face when using digital collaboration tools?
answer_options: Lack of integration with other tools
questions.client_notes: This question helps identify pain points. Consider allowing multiple selections to capture all challenges.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an 'Other' option for text input.

script.question_text: What challenges do you face when using digital collaboration tools?
answer_options: Lack of integration with other tools

questions.question_text: How often do you experience technical difficulties with digital collaboration tools?
questions.client_notes: This question gauges the frequency of technical issues. Ensure the options cover a broad range of frequencies.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.

script.question_text: How often do you experience technical difficulties with digital collaboration tools?

questions.question_text: What features would you like to see added to the digital collaboration tools you use?
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question allows respondents to suggest improvements. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What features would you like to see added to the digital collaboration tools you use?
